name: The openCOBRA Project
body:
# News
* **2014.01.09**: modelBorgifier added to the [Foundry](http://opencobra.sourceforge.net/openCOBRA/COBRA_Blog/Entries/2014/1/8_modelBorgifier__assimilating_genome_scale_reconstructions_to_a_unified_naming_scheme.html)
* **2013.10.01**: E. coli ME-Model in [Action](http://dx.doi.org/10.1038/msb.2013.52)
* **2013.08.17**: GIM3E added to the [Bakery](http://opencobra.sourceforge.net/openCOBRA/COBRA_Blog/Entries/2013/8/26_GIM3E__condition-specific_models_of_cellular_metabolism_developed_from_metabolomics_and_expression_data.html)
* **2013.08.17**: Yeast M-Model 6.0  [Published](http://database.oxfordjournals.org/content/2013/bat059.short)
* **2013.08.08**: COBRA for Python App Note  [Published](http://www.biomedcentral.com/1752-0509/7/74/abstract)
* **2013.04.19**: COBRA for Python 0.2.1 [Released](https://sourceforge.net/projects/opencobra/files/python/cobra/0.2.1/)
* **2013.03.13**: Human Metabolism Recon 2.0  [Published](http://www.nature.com/nbt/journal/vaop/ncurrent/full/nbt.2488.html)
* **2012.10.18**: Paint4Net added to the [Foundry](http://opencobra.sourceforge.net/openCOBRA/COBRA_Blog/Entries/2012/10/18_Paint4Net__flexible_visualization_of_the_COBRA_Toolbox_reconstructions_and_models.html)
* **2012.08.07**: The ME Generation in the Jacobs School [News](http://www.jacobsschool.ucsd.edu/news/news_releases/release.sfe?id=1245)
* **2012.07.05**: COBRA: The ME Generation [Published](http://opencobra.sourceforge.net/openCOBRA/COBRA_Blog/Entries/2012/7/5_COBRA__The_ME_Generation.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
